body.p: CARD OF THANKS We wish to thank our friends, the minis- ter, the pallbearers, the flower girls and the C. Z. B. J. for their kindness and sym- pathy shown upon the death of our wife and mother. JOSEPH HRYZ MARY HRYZ CARD OF THANKS We wish to express our heartfelt thanks and deep appreciation to the kind friends and neighbors for their many expressions of sympathy, at the time of our bereavement. M"RS. E. P. RIGGS AND FAMILY CANDIDATE FOR MARSHAL I am seeking the support of ever; voter in B. R. Falls for the office o City Marshal at the election on Apri 4th, 1939. In return for your support, i: elected, I pledge, no favoritism noi lack of cooperation shall be evideni in the execution of my duties. And I shall constantly endeavor tc harass business to a minimum in line of duty or otherwise. I will greatly appreciate vour vote. V. A. LUBINSKI
